name: Navy Combat Army Action
description:
Navy Combat Army Action is the ultimate gun shooting navy army soldier commando game. Play the role of a navy army military soldier commando on a mission to stop an attack in this 3D free roam open world game set in a beautiful immersive environment. Be the best military rifleman & sniper shooter & navy army commando soldier hero in this action filled game.
FEATURES

- Fast paced FPS combat
- Great selection of dangerous weapons (Rifles, Machine Guns, Rocket Launchers)!
- Explosive Missions to choose from
- Addictive shooting gameplay
- Great controller (not unlike other sticky ones)
